events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website but would like to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I want to return it.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to the product not fitting and a wish to return the item.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your jacket. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed? This will help process your refund quickly.
My order number is 459823, and I haven’t worn or washed the jacket. It’s still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process, and you will receive an email with the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the prompt help! I appreciate the quick response and the clear instructions to return the jacket.
The refund case has been resolved. Return shipping label sent and refund will be processed once we receive the jacket.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Your refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us.
